action: cd {{version_path}};mkdir backend && cd backend;git clone {{backend_url}} {{BACKEND_TAG}} && cd {{BACKEND_TAG}};git checkout {{BACKEND_TAG}} && /usr/local/bin/php composer.phar install
cd {{version_path}};mkdir global && cd global;git clone {{global_url}} {{GLOBAL_TAG}} && cd {{GLOBAL_TAG}};git checkout {{GLOBAL_TAG}} && /usr/local/bin/php composer.phar install
cd {{version_path}};mkdir vms && cd vms;git clone {{vms_url}} {{VMS_TAG}} && cd {{VMS_TAG}};git checkout {{VMS_TAG}}
cd {{version_path}};mkdir kakura && cd kakura;git clone {{kakura_url}} {{KAKURA_TAG}} && cd {{KAKURA_TAG}};git checkout {{KAKURA_TAG}}
cd /work/hifive/hifive_walle;git reset --hard;git pull;cp config.example.yaml config.yaml;sed -i '' 's/{project_name}/{{GAME_NAME}}/g' config.yaml

cd {{version_path}};mkdir config && cd config;svn co {{config_url}} {{CONFIG}} -r {{CONFIG}};python2.7 /work/hifive/hifive_walle/tool.py --inputPath /work/release/{{GAME_NAME}}/{{packages}}/playcrab/{{GAME_NAME}}/version/config/{{CONFIG}} --outputPath /work/release/{{GAME_NAME}}/{{packages}}/playcrab/{{GAME_NAME}}/version/config/test export_csv_to_php q;cd {{version_path}}/config;rm -rf {{CONFIG}};cp -r test {{CONFIG}};rm -rf test

if [ {{CONNECTOR_TAG}} ] ; then mkdir -p {{webroot_path}}  && cd {{webroot_path}};git clone {{connector_url}} connector;cd connector;git checkout {{CONNECTOR_TAG}};fi

if [ {{META_TAG}} ] ; then mkdir -p {{filecache_path}}/config/vms && cd {{filecache_path}};git clone {{meta_url}} ${GAME_NAME}_meta_templates;cd ${GAME_NAME}_meta_templates;git checkout {{META_TAG}}; fi

cd {{version_path}};mkdir versioninfo  && cd versioninfo;mkdir {{version}} && cd {{version}};echo \"<?php return array (\">> info.php;echo \\\"time\\\"=\>\\\"`date \"+%F %T\"`\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"kakura_tag\\\"=\>\\\"{{KAKURA_TAG}}\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"config_tag\\\"=\>\\\"{{CONFIG}}\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"upgrade_path\\\"=\>\\\"{{UPGRADE_PATH}}\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"version\\\"=\>{{version}}, >> info.php;echo \\\"os_platform\\\"=\>\\\"ios\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"matchserver_tag\\\"=\>\\\"{{MATCHSERVER_TAG}}\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"vms_tag\\\"=\>\\\"{{VMS_TAG}}\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"backend_tag\\\"=\>\\\"{{BACKEND_TAG}}\\\", >> info.php;echo \\\"global_tag\\\"=\>\\\"{{GLOBAL_TAG}}\\\", >> info.php;echo \");\" >> info.php

cd {{version_path}};cd versioninfo;cd {{version}};echo time=\\\"`date \"+%F %T\"`\\\" >> info.sh;echo kakura_tag=\\\"{{KAKURA_TAG}}\\\" >> info.sh;echo config_tag=\\\"{{CONFIG}}\\\"  >> info.sh;echo upgrade_path=\\\"{{UPGRADE_PATH}}\\\"  >> info.sh;echo os_platform=\\\"ios\\\" >> info.sh;echo version=\\\"{{version}}\\\" >> info.sh;echo vms_tag=\\\"{{VMS_TAG}}\\\" >> info.sh;echo backend_tag=\\\"{{BACKEND_TAG}}\\\" >> info.sh;echo global_tag=\\\"{{GLOBAL_TAG}}\\\" >> info.sh;echo matchserver_tag=\\\"{{MATCHSERVER_TAG}}\\\" >> info.sh;echo ca_branch=\\\"{{CA_BRANCH}}\\\" >> info.sh;

cd {{version_path}};cd versioninfo;cd {{version}};echo time: \\\"`date \"+%F %T\"`\\\" >> info.yaml;echo kakura_tag: {{KAKURA_TAG}} >> info.yaml;echo config_tag: \\\"{{CONFIG}}\\\"  >> info.yaml;echo upgrade_path: {{UPGRADE_PATH}}  >> info.yaml;echo os_platform: ios >> info.yaml;echo global_tag: {{GLOBAL_TAG}} >> info.yaml;echo version: \\\"{{version}}\\\" >> info.yaml;echo vms_tag: {{VMS_TAG}} >> info.yaml;echo backend_tag: {{BACKEND_TAG}} >> info.yaml;echo global_tag: {{GLOBAL_TAG}} >> info.yaml;echo ca_branch: {{CA_BRANCH}} >> info.yaml;echo matchserver_tag: {{MATCHSERVER_TAG}} >> info.yaml;echo '<?php return array ();' >> update.php
